description: Example of an AI usage event with value enrichment

value_enrichment.business_outcome: Faster creation of marketing campaign email draft
value_enrichment.summary: Marketing team member used ChatGPT to draft a campaign email, saving approximately 12 minutes. Moderate governance concern as the tool is unsanctioned, but no sensitive data appears to be involved.

governance_assessment.recommendation: Provide approved alternative (e.g., Microsoft Copilot) to reduce shadow AI while maintaining productivity gains
